item.title: Animating Still Images
item.description: This page has resources for matte paintings in film and VFX. I’ll update this as I find more resources. Resources Matte Painting Camera Animation || Nuke || Animatie Flix - YouTube

item.title: Compositing in Blender
item.description: Compositing for animation and VFX is a critical part of the pipeline. In fact often it is the part of the pipeline that gets you the last 10-20% for whatever project you are working on.

item.title: Houdini Squib Setup
item.description: Simple Squib Setup in Houdini Squibs are used in VFX for small explosions like gun shots and things. In practical effects squibs are small explosives that are rigged to blow at the right time.

item.title: Linux in Studios
item.description: 2021 Studio Platform Survey Report.pdf - Google Drive “All three major operating systems have a substantial presence across the responding studios.
